title: (1) Epson Discproducer PP-100AP Autoprinter
item_description:
(1) Epson Discproducer PP-100AP Autoprinter

(1) Epson Discproducer PP-100AP Autoprinter

  • includes a box of ink cartridges
  • Windows Compatible
  • 100-Disc Capacity
  • Print Up to 95 Discs an Hour
  • USB Interface
  • The Epson Discproducer PP-100AP – Autoprinter uses vibrant six-color inkjet printingm precision AcuGrip technology and easy-to-use software to produce high quality disc prints every time. The Autoprinter allows you to print up to 100 discs at print speeds of 95 discs per hour.
  • Discproducer features a built-in inkjet printer with Epson’s patented MicroPiezo technology. Using six colors.
  • Advanced robotics
  • Discproducer’s robotic arm with patented AcuGripTM technology ensures that only one disc is placed in the drive or printer at a time.
